#include<stdio.h>
unsigned long long pal(unsigned long long n){
    unsigned long long rev=0;
            while(n>0)
            {
                rev = rev*10+(n%10);
                n/=10;
            }
        return rev;
}
 
int main(){
    #ifdef raj
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
        freopen("log.txt", "w", stderr);
        #endif
    int n,l=0;
    unsigned long long p,p1,sum,p_sum,x,x1,x2;
 
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--){
        l=0;
        scanf("%llu",&p);
        l++;
        p1=pal(p);
        sum=p+p1;
        p_sum=pal(sum);
        if(p_sum==sum)
        printf("%d %llu\n",l,p_sum);
        else{
           int t=1;
           while(t==1){
               l++;
               x=p_sum;
                x1=pal(x);
                x=x+x1;
                p_sum=pal(x);
                if(x==p_sum){
                    t=0;
                }
           }
           printf("%d %llu\n",l,p_sum);
        }
    }
 return 0;
}
